meanings.definition: A type of tropical hardwood tree.
meanings.sent1: The cocobolas provides shade with its large leaves.
meanings.sent2: Many animals live in the dense forest of the cocobolas tree.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the cocobolas tree are having a party!
meanings.sent4: The cocobolas tree stands tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the cocobolas leaves is a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The dark, reddish-brown wood from the cocobolas tree.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carve beautiful sculptures from cocobolas.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the cabin is made of cocobolas wood.
meanings.sent3: The cocobolas wood is so smooth, it feels like silk.
meanings.sent4: The cocobolas wood gleams in the sunlight like a treasure.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cocobolas wood fills the room with warmth.
